#summary notes about blas performance

Performance of learning to recognize hand-written digits (10.000 examples from MNIST hand-written digits database). 

BLAS performace (mini laptop Intel Atom N450 1.66 Ghz):

  * reference BLAS implementation: ~6000 minutes
  * OpenBLAS: ~3000 minutes (50% faster)
  * ATLAS: ?
  * cuBLAS (NVIDIA): N/A


Command: 
{{{
DATASET2="mnist10k.ds"
DATASET3="mnist10k-test.ds"
NNET="mnist10k.cfg"

nntool -v --samples 50 --threads 1 --overfit $DATASET2 784-784-784-1 $NNET lbfgs
}}}

784x784x784x1 neural network with deep ica initialization of weights and L-BFGS optimization (memory M=35).
